entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
